file_insights.changes_summary: Added success state with animated checkmark icon
key_additions: AnimatedCheckIcon styled component with keyframe animation
Refactored icon rendering logic into getStartIcon() and getEndIcon() functions

patterns_discovered.description: Icon display follows priority order: success > loading > custom icon, preventing conflicting state representations
patterns_discovered.significance: Ensures consistent UX by establishing clear visual precedence

patterns_discovered.description: Styled component with dual animations: scaleIn for outer icon, strokeDasharray for SVG path stroke drawing effect
patterns_discovered.significance: Provides polished visual feedback with coordinated animation timing

patterns_discovered.description: Icon rendering logic checks both success state and position prop to determine correct placement
patterns_discovered.significance: Supports flexible icon positioning while maintaining success state visibility

gotchas_discovered.description: AnimatedCheckIcon defines draw-circle keyframes but strokeDashoffset values (1 and 0) appear unscaled; unclear if these should correspond to actual SVG path length
gotchas_discovered.potential_issue: Stroke animation may not render as intended if SVG path strokeDasharray values don't match configuration

gotchas_discovered.description: No explicit timeout or animation completion callback when success state is triggered; unclear how long button remains in success state
gotchas_discovered.potential_issue: May need parent component to manage success state reset after animation completes

gotchas_discovered.description: Relies on @/utils/animations module providing scaleIn keyframes and animation constants; these are not defined in diff
gotchas_discovered.potential_issue: Missing animation utilities could cause runtime errors if module doesn't export expected values

approach_outcome.implementation_strategy: Extended Button component with optional success prop and implemented animated checkmark display using MUI icon and styled components
key_accomplishments: Added success state prop with clear type definition
Implemented smooth scale-in animation for checkmark appearance
Refactored icon rendering to handle multiple state representations cleanly
Maintained backward compatibility by making success prop optional with false default
approach_outcome.completeness: Feature appears fully implemented with proper state handling and animation setup

recommendations.recommendation: Verify the strokeDasharray values in AnimatedCheckIcon draw-circle animation match the actual CheckCircleIcon SVG path length (typically 0-100 or similar range)
Consider adding an optional onAnimationComplete callback prop to allow parent components to reset success state after animation finishes
Document the success state behavior, animation duration, and typical usage pattern in Button component comments or JSDoc
Add unit tests for: success state rendering, animation triggering, icon position combinations, and state priority (success overriding loading state)
Verify animated checkmark is accessible to screen readers; consider adding aria-label or aria-live region for success state changes
